name: @cdw0424/super-prompt
description: Super Prompt v5.6.0 - Cursor-first MCP research & delivery copilot

scripts.clean:py: find . -type d -name __pycache__ -prune -exec rm -rf {} + >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; find . -name '*.pyc' -delete >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; find packages -type d -name __pycache__ -prune -exec rm -rf {} + >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; find packages -name '*.pyc' -delete >/dev/null 2>&1 || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist || true && rm -rf python-packages/super-prompt-core/dist || true && npm run clean:py
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && node scripts/prepare-python-dist.js && npm run build
scripts.install:python: python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages --upgrade typer pyyaml pathspec mcp fastmcp && python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages ./python-packages/super-prompt-core || (python -m pip install --break-system-packages --upgrade typer pyyaml pathspec mcp fastmcp && python -m pip install --break-system-packages ./python-packages/super-prompt-core)
scripts.sp:verify:all: npm run ssot:verify && npm run build && echo 'âœ… All verifications passed'

author: Daniel Choi
